name: Getting Started
description: Welcome to Octoblu Mobile Hub. This app allows you to connect your device's sensor data to Octoblu and Skynet. You can also message other devices.

steps.name: Login
steps.description: First login with octoblu to manage your skynet system.

steps.name: Test
steps.description: Watch SkyNet update your sensor data.

steps.name: Setup flows
steps.description: Create flows through Octoblu's designer to trigger events when something happens.

steps.name: Message Devices
steps.description: Use our interface for messaging devices on your network.
